{{{
result = []
        i      = -1
        for i in range(dm_read.count()):
            data, bbox = dm_read.stats(i+1)
            bbox = np.array(bbox)
            x, y = bbox[:,0], bbox[:,1]
            pos  = (np.min(x), np.min(y), np.max(x)-np.min(x),
                    np.max(y)-np.min(y))
            result.append({'ID':       (i+1),
                            #'Data':     dm_read.message(i+1),
                           'Data':     data,
                           'Position': pos,
                           'Type':     u'DataMatrix',
                           'Quality':  10})
}}}
